bs-emoticons-desc: Used in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=ExtensionInfo}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=ExtensionInfo], description of emoticons extension
bs-emoticons-error-validation-missing-sy:
Error message for error in line $1: There is no symbol for the image "$2".

$1 is line number where the error occurred, $2 is the name of the image.
bs-emoticons-error-validation-imagename:
Error message for error in line $1: The image name "$2" is not valid.
* $1 is line number where the error occurred,
* $2 is the name of the image.
bs-emoticons-error-validation-symbol:
Error message for error in line $1: The symbol "$2" is not valid. It has to be between two and ten characters.
 $1 is line number where the error occurred, $2 is the name of the symbol.
